sentences.en: European families emigrating from their homelands were encouraged to immigrate into Australia after World War II.
sentences.cn: 二战以后欧洲移出原籍的家庭被鼓励移居澳大利亚.

sentences.en: He decided to immigrate to Australia to find work.
sentences.cn: 他决定移居到澳大利亚找个工作.

sentences.en: His father and mother immigrated when he was two.
sentences.cn: 他的父母在他两岁时移民到这里。

sentences.en: Only few plants can immigrate to the island.
sentences.cn: 只有很少的植物能够移植到这座岛上.

sentences.en: When did the Greeks immigrate to australia?
sentences.cn: 希腊人是什么时候移居到澳大利亚的?

trans.tran_en: to come into a country in order to live there permanently
to come into a country in order to live there permanently
